meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a pincer
meanings.sent1: The crab had pincerlike claws that it used to catch its prey.
meanings.sent2: The toy robot had pincerlike hands for picking up small objects.
meanings.sent3: The pincerlike scissors danced across the paper, cutting out shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her pincerlike grip on the steering wheel showed her determination to win the race.
meanings.sent5: The pincerlike clouds in the sky seemed to be reaching down to touch the earth.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or function of a pincer
meanings.sent1: The pincerlike tool was perfect for grabbing items from tight spaces.
meanings.sent2: The beetle had pincerlike mouthparts for grasping leaves.
meanings.sent3: The pincerlike door handle made it easy to open the heavy door.
meanings.sent4: His pincerlike fingers delicately picked up the fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The pincerlike movement of the crane's arm mimicked a giant metal claw.
